result.execSummary:
The defendant Kyle R. Bottolfson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
All probation terms are consecutive to 13CF438 count 1 and 12CF447 count 1.
Concurrent with: Count 3 12CF447.

miscConds.notes: $290.60 fine/costs to be paid through Clerk of Courts Office - 60 days to pay or setup payment plan.
Must provide DNA sample and pay surcharge.
May not possess/use firearms or body armor.

May not vote until civil rights are restored.  
Cannot hold elected office.
If not a US citizen may face deportation.  
Potential loss of other citizenship rights.

CASES: 12CF447, 13CF438, 14CF149 & 14CF223. Defendant Kyle R. Bottolfson in court with attorney Jeffrey Lawrence Kemp.  Defendant Kyle R. Bottolfson in custody.  Daniel P. Steffen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  NO firearms, cannot vote until civil rights restored, cannot hold elected office, no body armor, if not US citizen face deportation, potential loss of other citizenship rights. 
14CF223-Waiver of PSI.  Count 1-guilty.  CT-accept plea, adj guilty.  CT finds Waiver of PSI.
Kemp-def requesting a new PSI.  Kemp-withdraw request for PSI.  Recess 11:43 am.  12:00 pm back on record.  Restitution request - exh 1 & 2 - J&S w/ co-def's.  Kemp-no obj to either.  CT finds not elig for CIP & not elig for SA pgm.  Restitution will be J&S w/ other defs.  

12CF447-Count 1-  3 yrs 6 mo- 1 yr 6 mo IC, 2 yr ES, consec to 13CF438 count 1.  15 yr SO registry.  $290.60
Count 3-w/h, probation 3 yrs - consec to sentence in count 1.  Also consec to count 1 in 13CF438.  $290.60  DNA - no surcharge, NC w/ females age 17 or younger w/o consent of probation/parole.  

13CF438-  8 yrs, 5 yr IC & 3 yrs ES-consec. to count 1 in 12CF447.  NC w/ Mr Mohs or his property.  $290.60 fine/costs.  DNA surcharge.

14CF149/14CF223-  w/h sentence, probation 3 yrs -conccur w/ count 3 in 12CF447.  All probation terms are consecutive to 13CF438 count 1 & 12CF447 count 1.  COMPAS & follow recommendations.  No firearms, cannot vote until civil rights restored, if not US citizen face deportation or loss of other citzenship rights, no body armor.  14CF149-$290.60 & 14CF223.  DNA surcharge ea count. 
14CF149-restitution to Mr Lindahl $391.91 w/ surcharge total = $431.10 J&S w/ Ethan Thomas & Cody Aamold.  No contact w/ Andrew Lindahl-14CF149
Walmart-714.79 J&S w/ Haley Eason, Jesse Stelton, Christopher Rundquist & Ashley Bottolfson.
Find 168 days sentence credit to count 1 in 12CF447.  PCR.  12:49 pm adj.
